channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Europe’s defense buildup will fall short unless one big problem is solved: Randstad CEO
item.description: European nations are dramatically increasing defense spending, but that alone won’t be enough.

item.title: The 2025 Tony Nominees Discuss Their Biggest Tests and Triumphs
item.description: George Clooney, Audra McDonald, Daniel Dae Kim, Sarah Snook and other Broadway stars talk about the challenges they’ve faced — and surmounted.

item.title: Climate change and nature loss merit radical prioritization amid a sprawling sustainability agenda, say former CEOs
item.description: Corporate action should prioritize threats to climate and nature given the commercial and societal risks linked to them.

item.title: European Central Bank Cuts Rates as Trade War Weighs on the Economy
item.description: It was the eighth rate cut in the past year, extending the bank’s divergence from the Federal Reserve, which has held rates steady since the end of la...

item.title: Imports Plummet in April as Trump’s Tariffs Weigh on Trade
item.description: Americans bought fewer pharmaceuticals, cellphones and cars from other countries, and cut purchases of foreign machinery and other supplies.

item.title: European Central Bank cuts rate to 2% amid struggling eurozone growth and stable inflation
item.description: The European Central Bank said inflation of 1.9% was now around target, dropping the previous language that it was merely "on track".

item.title: Selfishness Is Not a Virtue
item.description: Evangelical Christianity has taken a wrong turn.

item.title: Supreme Court Blocks Mexico’s Suit Against U.S. Gunmakers
item.description: The case focused on whether the Mexican government could legally sue U.S. manufacturers over claims that they shared blame for violence by drug cartel...

item.title: House Speaker Mike Johnson says Trump is ‘not delighted that Elon did a 180’ after the pair spent four months working closely together
item.description: Donald Trump and Elon Musk have a complex history.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 is now available. Here’s how to get your hands on one
item.description: Console's release is likely to be the gaming event of the year.

item.title: Trump Travel Order Bans People From 12 Countries From Entering U.S.
item.description: The travel ban revives an effort from President Trump’s first term that led to chaos and court battles.

item.title: New Zealand’s Parliament Suspends Maori Lawmakers Over Haka Protest
item.description: The harsh penalty was handed down to three members of the opposition who said they were voicing their community’s displeasure with proposed legislatio...

item.title: New Zealand Parliament Suspends Lawmakers for Haka Dance Protest
item.description: Co-leaders of the Te Pāti Māori party, Rawiri Waititi and Debbie Ngarewa-Packer, were suspended on Thursday without pay for 21 days, and another membe...

item.title: Syrians Rejoice at Being Exempted From Trump Travel Ban
item.description: Damascus residents hope the decision is another sign that the world is normalizing relations with Syria after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad.

item.title: Trump and Xi Hold Call, China Says
item.description: Chinese state media said the leaders spoke by phone on Thursday, amid worsening tensions between Washington and Beijing.
